subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Cory Conacher, listed at 5-foot-8, tried out for three minor league teams before earning a pro contract. Now he leads all N.H.L. rookies in points.
snippet: Cory Conacher, listed at 5-foot-8, tried out for three minor league teams before earning a pro contract. Now he leads all N.H.L. rookies in points.
